title: Home Feed - Video Carousel all 30 teams
custom_preconds: Given user an iPhone with MLB app install on device
custom_steps: WHEN User Navigates to HomeFeed
custom_expected: Then user will see the most popular highlights from around the league and all 30 teams.

title: Most Popular Highlights Carousel of videos
custom_preconds: Given user an iPhone with MLB app install on device
custom_steps: When user navigates to Top Highlights user will see Most Popular Highlights Carousel of videos
custom_expected: Then user will see the Most Popular Highlights Carousel of videos and able to scroll it

title: Display the video title below the thumbnail
custom_preconds: Given user an iPhone with MLB app install on device
custom_steps: When user navigates to the Home Feed Top Highlights
custom_expected: THEN user will see Display the video title below the thumbnail.

title: Side to side horizontal swiping takes you from video to video
custom_preconds: Given user an iPhone with MLB app install on device
custom_steps: WHEN User Navigates to Top Highlights videos Side to side
custom_expected: THEN user will able to Side to side horizontal swiping takes you from video to video

title: Each video should snap to place when swiped
custom_preconds: Given user an iPhone with MLB app install on device
custom_steps: WHEN User Navigates to Top Highlights Carousel
custom_expected: THEN user will able to see Each video should snap to place when swiped

title: Autoplay video when the video is in focus, and start autoplay of first video in the carousel, and video will be muted
custom_preconds: Given user an iPhone with MLB app install on device and Autoplay is enabled
custom_steps: When User navigate to HomeFeed Top Highlights Carousel
custom_expected: THEN Use will able to Autoplay video when the video is in focus, and start autoplay of first video in the carousel, and video will be muted

title: Tapping on a video will clickthrough into the video playlist view
custom_preconds: Given user an iPhone with MLB app install on device
custom_steps: WHEN User Navigates to HomeFeed Top Highlights Carousel
custom_expected: THEN user will able to Tapping on a video will clickthrough into the video playlist view

title: Current video that was clicked will play at the top followed by the videos in the index listed below in the playlist view
custom_preconds: Given user an iPhone with MLB app install on device
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to HomeFeed - Top Highlights Videos Carousel and clicked on play to videos
custom_expected: Top Video should autoplay and followed by the videos in the index listed below in the playlist view

title: See All” button will display all videos in the index in the playlist view
custom_preconds: Given user an iPhone with MLB app install on device
custom_steps: WHEN user Navigates to HomeFeed Top Highlights Carousel
custom_expected: THEN user will See All” button will display all videos in the index in the playlist view.

title: Duration of the video will be displayed in a bubble on the video thumbnail
custom_preconds: Given user an iPhone with MLB app install on device
custom_steps: WHEN user Navigates to HomeFeed Top Highlights videos Carousel and play video
custom_expected: THEN user will see Duration of the video will be displayed in a bubble on the video thumbnail

title: Preroll ad support
custom_preconds: Given user an iPhone with MLB app install on device
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to HomeFeed - Top Highlights Videos Carousel - Preroll ad support
custom_expected: preroll ads will be limited to the playlist view, similar to what we do on autoplay videos on the team page carousel.

title: Localization support for ES
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user's device language settings is set to ES (Spanish)
AND the user taps on the News section
AND the user taps on an article in the News Index
custom_steps: When user Navigates to HomeFeed Top Highlights News Index
custom_expected: Top Highlights News Index should be in Spanish

title: Analytics tracking support for each interaction
custom_preconds: Given user an iPhone with MLB app install on device

title: Accessibility attributes support for VoiceOver
custom_preconds: Given user an iPhone with MLB app install on device
custom_steps: When user Navigate to Settings click on Accessibility
custom_expected: Then user will see option to turn on the VoiceOver Accessibility

title: Light/Dark Mode support
custom_preconds: Given user an iPhone with MLB app install on device
custom_steps: WHEN user changes the setting to Light or Dark Mode
custom_expected: THEN user should have same smooth experienced in Dark or Light Mode

title: See all in video carousel feed
custom_preconds: Given user an iPhone with MLB app install on device
custom_steps: When user navigates to HomeFeed Most Popular Videos Highlights Carousel and lick on "See All"
custom_expected: THEN user will see “See All” button will display all videos in the index in the playlist view and have access all of the carousel videos through tapping on a See All button next to the video section header.

title: See all in news feed
custom_preconds: Given user an iPhone with MLB app install on device
custom_steps: When user navigates to HomeFeed Most Popular Highlights Carousel
custom_expected: THEN user will see “See All” button will display all in the News index in the playlist view

title: Home Feed - MLB + all 30 teams
custom_preconds: Given user an iPhone with MLB app install on device
custom_steps: When user navigates to HomeFeed Video Carousel to watch the most popular highlights from around the league and all 30 teams.
custom_expected: THEN user will able to see Video carousels will display for MLB + all 30 teams

title: HomeFeed - Videos Autoplay on mute
custom_preconds: Given user an iPhone with MLB app install on device and Autoplay is enabled
custom_steps: When user navigates to HomeFeed Videos Carousel
custom_expected: Then Use should see in Video section Autoplay first video with Mute on

title: HomeFeed - Top Highlights - Video Autoplay
custom_preconds: Given user an iPhone with MLB app install on device and Autoplay is enabled
custom_steps: When user navigates to HomeFeed Top Highlights Videos Carousel and click on "See All"
custom_expected:
Then Use should see the first video to autoplay in the videos carousel.

Autoplay the first video in the carousel 

Follow existing autoplay settings in the app

title: HomeFeed - Top Highlights Videos Carousel - Preroll ad support
custom_preconds: Given the user has the MLB app installed, User is free/lite user
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to HomeFeed - Top Highlights Videos Carousel - Preroll ad support
custom_expected: THEN user will see Preroll ad playing

title: HomeFeed - Accessibility attributes support for VoiceOver
custom_preconds: Given user an iPhone with MLB app install on device and VoiceOver Accessibility is enable
custom_steps: When user navigate Home Feed Need index and tap on Article
custom_expected: Then user should able to hear VoiceOver speaks the name of each item Article you touch.

title: Webview Articles
custom_preconds: Given the user is viewing the News Index
custom_steps: When the user taps a news article from the index
custom_expected: Then the article will launch in a webview

title: Loading Indicator
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the News Index
custom_steps: AND the user taps on an article
custom_expected: THEN the user should be shown a loading indicator (progress bar) prior to the article being displayed

title: Article Title Header - News
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing a webview article from the News index
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the header of the article
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the word "News" displayed in EN
AND the word "Noticias" in ES 
AND the article title will not be displayed in the header

title: Edge Swiping
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user taps on the News section
AND the user taps on an article in the News Index
custom_steps: WHEN the user decides to go back to the previous News Index
custom_expected: THEN the user can edge gesture swipe back to the previous screen

title: Returning to News Index via Edge Swiping (Stacking Articles)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user taps on the News section
AND the user taps on an article in the News Index
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates through multiple articles within the view
AND the articles stack on top of each other
custom_expected: THEN the user is able to navigate back through the stacked articles one-by-one to the News Index by Edge swiping.

title: Invalid URLs in newsreader
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user taps on an article in the newsreader
custom_steps: WHEN there is a malformed URL or the URL is unable to load for whatever reason
custom_expected: THEN the user should see an alert or other messaging stating that there is a problem with the URL

title: "Done" Button  Functionality - Push Notifications
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user receives a push notification that opens up a News story
custom_steps:
WHEN the user views the news story 
from any  notification
custom_expected: THEN the Done button will take the user back to the default view

title: Player Card - Push Notification
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has a notification for a news article that includes a player link
custom_steps:
When the user opens the notification
AND tap on the player link
custom_expected: THEN the Player card should present modally on top of the story, without dismissing the article below it

title: Player Card - X button
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing a webview article from the News index
custom_steps: WHEN the user tap on a player link in the webview article
custom_expected:
THEN the player card opens in a modal on top of the article 
and it includes an "X" button to close the modal

title: Scroll Indicator
custom_preconds:
GIVEN 
- Device setting is on dark mode
- the user is on the News Index
custom_steps: AND the user taps on an article and scroll
custom_expected: THEN the scroll bar on articles in dark mode does not appear in black color but appears in light color

title: Loading indicator (Low connectivity)
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on low connectivity environment
custom_steps: WHEN user taps on an article from the News index
custom_expected: THEN Loading indicator should appear before every article load

title: Offline/Airplane Mode and Refresh Button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has low connectivity and cannot load an article
OR the user has their device in Airplane mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user has a stable connection
custom_expected:
THEN a refresh button will be available to tap on 
AND tapping on the refresh button will load the article again for viewing

title: Share Functionality Within Article
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user taps on the News section
AND the user taps on an article in the News Index
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is viewing the webview article
AND there is a Share button available to tap on
custom_expected:
THEN the share tray will be visible
AND the user is able to share the content to their desired platform

title: Localization (Spanish ES)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user's device language settings is set to ES (Spanish)
AND the user taps on the News section
AND the user taps on an article in the News Index
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the news index and article
custom_expected: THEN both the News Index content and article should load successfully in Spanish

title: Dark/Light Mode Support
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has their device in Light Mode
OR the user has their device in dark mode
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the News Index and taps on an article
custom_expected:
THEN the user's device Dark/Light mode should be respected
AND the article should be displayed based on their preferences

title: Free/Not Logged-in Users - Ads
custom_preconds:
Given the user is a free user that is not logged in 
AND the user is viewing an article within the News Index
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the article
custom_expected:
THEN an advertisement should be visible at the top of the article
AND an a preroll ad should play before video begins playback within article

title: Free/Logged-in Users - Ads
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is a free user that is logged in 
AND the user is viewing an article within the News Index
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the article
custom_expected:
THEN an advertisement should be visible at the top of the article
AND an a preroll ad should play before video begins playback within article

title: MLBALL Users - Ads
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is logged in with an MLBALL
custom_steps: WHEN the user views an article within the News Index
custom_expected: THEN the user will not see any ads or prerolls displayed within articles

title: MLBALL (Anonymous) Users - Ads
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is entitled with MLBALL (via in-app purchase)
but has not logged in to the app
custom_steps: WHEN the user views an article within the News Index
custom_expected: THEN the user will not see any ads or prerolls displayed within articles

title: MLBAUDIO Users - Ads
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is logged in with an MLBAUDIO account
custom_steps: WHEN the user views an article within the News Index
custom_expected: THEN the user will not see any ads or prerolls displayed within articles

title: Single Team Users - Ads
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is logged in with a Single Team account
custom_steps: WHEN the user views an article within the News Index
custom_expected: THEN the user will not see any ads or prerolls displayed within articles

title: Team Filter
custom_preconds: Given the user is viewing the News index
custom_steps:
When the user taps the team filter at the top
and selects a new team
custom_expected: Then the newly selected team's news index will load

title: Home Feed - My Highlights
custom_preconds:
GIVEN

+ The user does or does not have a favorited team saved

AND

+ The user navigates to the Home page from the bottom navigation
custom_steps:
WHEN

+ Observing the Home page carousels and news sections
custom_expected:
THEN

+ The user will be able to view "My Highlights" under "My News" 

AND

+ When a video player is selected, the playlist player will function as expected with video playback

title: Home Feed - Video Carousel thumbnail
custom_preconds: Given user an iPhone with MLB app install on device
custom_steps: WHEN User Navigates to HomeFeed
custom_expected: Display the video title below the thumbnail

title: Home Feed - Video Carousel swiping side to side
custom_preconds: Given user an iPhone with MLB app install on device
custom_steps: WHEN User Navigates to HomeFeed
custom_expected: Side to side horizontal swiping takes you from video to video

title: Home Feed - Video Carousel Snap to place
custom_preconds: Given user an iPhone with MLB app install on device
custom_steps: WHEN User Navigates to HomeFeed
custom_expected: Then user will able to Snap to place

title: Tapping on a video thumbnail
custom_preconds: Given user an iPhone with MLB app install on device
custom_steps: When user navigates to the Home Feed Top Highlights
custom_expected: Tapping on a video thumbnail plays the selected video in the playlist view

title: Top video one is the most popular on the playlist
custom_preconds: Given user an iPhone with MLB app install on device
custom_steps: When user navigates to the Home Feed Top Highlights
custom_expected: All videos below the one playing at the top of the playlist view are in the most popular index for the selected team or MLB

title: Video time and date
custom_preconds: GIVEN a User on the Home page
custom_steps:
WHEN a video thumbnail is tapped
AND the Videos page opens
custom_expected: THEN the video's runtime and date display directly under the video title

title: Carousel  Scrolls - Analytics
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user scrolling the video carousel on the Home page
custom_steps: WHEN each thumbnail is snapped
custom_expected:
THEN the following data will be logged to Adobe:

trackAction: MLB App : Home Feed : <clubAbbreviation> : Content Carousel : Carousel Scroll
action.element.index: <the index of the carousel element to which the user snapped>
action.element.text: <the visible text of the carousel element to which the user snapped>
action.element.sectionIndex: 0
action.element.sectionTitle: "Top Highlights"

title: Carousel Content Clicks - Analytics
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user on the Home page video carousel
custom_steps: WHEN content is clicked
custom_expected:
THEN data similar to the following example will be logged to Adobe: 

trackAction:	MLB App : Home Feed : MLB : Top Highlights : Content Card Click			
action.element.index:	0			
action.element.sectionIndex:	0			
action.element.text:	Legendary managers join Reynolds			
action.element.video.slug	/legendary-mangers-join-reynolds

title: Banner Ad
custom_preconds:
- Given user is non-entitled 
- Given a user have selected a Team Page
custom_steps: When a Team Page is loaded
custom_expected: Then the banner ad at the bottom of the screen should appear

title: Inline Ad
custom_preconds:
- Given a user is non entitled 
- Given a user is on a Team Page
custom_steps: When a user swipes to the bottom of the Team Page
custom_expected:
- Then the user will see the appropriate team logo watermark

- Then the user will see the inline ad above the watermark

title: Preroll Ad - See All
custom_preconds:
Given a user is on a Team Page
and the user is not entitled
custom_steps: When the user taps “See All” link from Videos carousel
custom_expected: Then the lead video of Playlist view will launch with preroll ad

title: Preroll Ad - Tapping Video
custom_preconds:
Given a user is on a Team Page
and the user is not entitled
custom_steps: When the user taps a video from Videos carousel
custom_expected: Then the video will launch in Playlist view with preroll ad

title: Banner Ad
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user is not entitled
custom_steps: When the user is viewing the Scoreboard
custom_expected: Then the user should see Ad at the bottom of the screen

title: Banner Ad
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
And the user is not entitled
custom_steps: When the user is on the News tab
custom_expected: Then the user should see the banner ad at the bottom

title: Banner Ad
custom_preconds:
Given app is installed 
and the user is not entitled
custom_steps: When the user is viewing the Videos tab
custom_expected: Then the user should see banner ad in bottom of the screen

title: Playlist View - Initial launch
custom_preconds: Given the user is not entitled
custom_steps: When the user is viewing the Videos tab
custom_expected: Then the initial video should launch with a preroll ad

title: Playlist View - Subsequent Video Launch
custom_preconds:
Given the user is on videos tab
and the user is not entitled
custom_steps: When the user taps on a subsequent video
custom_expected: Then the user should see preroll ad

title: Inline Ad
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the app has been installed
AND the user is not entitled
custom_steps: When the user is on the Standings tab
custom_expected: Then the user should see the Inline ad (between division tables)

title: Midroll Ads
custom_preconds:
Given the app is installed
and the user is logged in with a TV-entitled account
and there are MLB.TV feeds available
custom_steps:
When the user is viewing an MLB.TV feed
and the game goes to commercial break
custom_expected: Then the user will see midroll ads during the commercial break

title: Wrap Video - Team Page
custom_preconds:
Given the user is not entitled
and a game is in final
custom_steps:
When the user taps on "Wrap" from Team page schedule snapshot
and the user taps on the Wrap Video, or it autoplays
custom_expected: Then the user will see a preroll ad

title: Wrap Video - Scoreboard
custom_preconds:
Given the user is not entitled
and a game is in final
custom_steps:
When the user taps on a final game from the Scoreboard 
and the user taps on the Wrap Video, or it autoplays
custom_expected: Then the user will see a preroll ad

title: Live
custom_preconds:
Given game is live
and the user is not entitled
custom_steps:
When the user launches Gameday 
and is viewing the Pitch by Pitch > Live tab
and taps on a video
custom_expected: Then the Playlist view will launch with preroll ad

title: Summary (Scoring Tab) - Team Page
custom_preconds:
Given the user is not entitled
and the User is in team page (During Live and final games)
custom_steps:
When the user taps the Summary link
and then taps one of the videos from the Scoring Plays tab
custom_expected: Then the Playlist view will launch with preroll ad

title: Videos - Team Page
custom_preconds:
Given the user is not entitled
and the user is in Team page (During Live and final games)
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the Videos link
and then taps on a video
custom_expected: Then the Playlist view will launch with preroll ad

title: Videos - Banner Ad
custom_preconds: Given the user is not entitled
custom_steps: When user is on the Gameday Videos tab
custom_expected: Then the user should see banner ad in bottom of the screen

title: Playlist View - Subsequent Video Launch
custom_preconds:
Given the user is not entitled
and is viewing Gameday
custom_steps: When the user has launches the video playlist view from Gameday and then taps on subsequent video
custom_expected: Then the user should see preroll ad before the next video is launched

title: Placement of Watch Live
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to the Home page from the bottom navigation of the app
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the segments at the top of the app
custom_expected:
THEN the usr will see "Watch Live" to the right of and next to the MLB.tv tab 

AND the user is able to tap on Watch Live to view the page

title: No Videos Being Returned
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has navigated to the Home page from the bottom navigation of the app
custom_steps:
WHEN the user taps on and views the Watch live tab
AND there is no content returned
custom_expected:
THEN the user will receive the following message, "No Live videos. Please swing back later."

AND a spanish language user will see, "Sin videos en vivo. ¡Por favor, vuelve más tarde!"

title: Supported Content
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user taps on the Home button from the bottom navigation of the app
AND the user taps on Watch Live from the top navigation
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the available content from Watch Live
custom_expected: THEN the user will be able to view VOD, SVOD, FLive, and Live AD Hoc content

title: No Share Button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user taps on the Home button from the bottom navigation of the app
AND the user taps on Watch Live from the top navigation
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the thumbnail of the content on the Watch Live page
custom_expected: THEN no share icon will be visible on the thumbnail or on the page

title: Unentitled User
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an UNENTITLED user taps on the Home button from the bottom navigation of the app
AND the user taps on Watch Live from the top navigation
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on a content that requires the unentitled user to provide credentials
custom_expected: THEN the user will be sent to the paywall
